featured.text: In 1761, while living in England, Franklin heard a performer playing musical glasses.
The performer’s fingers have to be slightly wet when playing it.
Performers usually play on a tall stage with lanterns and banners strung all around.

definition.zh_def: 表演者，特別是在音樂、戲劇或舞蹈等表演藝術中進行表演的人。
definition.en_def: A person who entertains an audience by acting, singing, dancing, or playing a musical instrument.
definition.example: The performer captivated the audience with her stunning dance routine.
